text: Directorate of Technical Education () is a Bangladesh government Directorate under the Ministry of Education responsible for the development, expansion and research in the field of technical education in Bangladesh. Md. Sanowar Hossain is the Director General of the Directorate of Technical Education. ==History== Directorate of Technical Education was established in 1960 under the Ministry of Education, when Bangladesh was part of Pakistan. The Directorate is responsible for 64 Technical School and College, 49 Polytechnic Institutes, one Degree Level Technical Teachers Training College and four Engineering College. ==References== Category:1960 establishments in Pakistan Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Government departments of Bangladesh
title: Directorate of Technical Education
